description: Once a thriving oasis town founded by Toto with support from King Cobra, Yuba has been devastated by three years of relentless drought and sandstorms. Now buried in sand and abandoned by all except Toto, who continues to dig for water.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Devastated Yuba
keyMoments.description: The crew reaches Yuba only to find it completely buried in sand, with no signs of the rebel army they sought.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the severity of Alabasta's drought crisis and the desperation driving the conflict.

keyMoments.title: Vivi Reunites with Toto
keyMoments.description: Princess Vivi encounters Toto, the only remaining resident stubbornly refusing to abandon his town.
keyMoments.significance: Personalizes the tragedy of the drought through Toto's weathered appearance and unwavering dedication.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Helps Dig for Water
keyMoments.description: Moved by Toto's determination, Luffy joins him in digging for water through the night.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's respect for those who never give up on their dreams.

reveals.information: Yuba was founded thirteen years ago by Toto with King Cobra's support
The town has been completely devastated by three years of drought
Toto is the only person who remains, endlessly digging for water

description: A café in Alabasta operated by Miss Doublefinger (under the alias 'Paula') that serves as a covert meeting location for Baroque Works officer agents. The café acts as a front for the criminal organization's activities.

keyMoments.title: Officer Agents Gather
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works' top officer agents assemble at Spiders Café at 8 o'clock, answering the summons to meet Mr. 0.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the café as a Baroque Works front and brings together all major antagonists before their meeting with Crocodile.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 1's Dramatic Entry
keyMoments.description: Daz Bonez bursts through the café wall, making a striking first impression.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Mr. 1's intimidating presence and shows the casual destruction agents cause.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 1 and Mr. 2 Clash
keyMoments.description: A brief confrontation between Mr. 1 and Mr. 2 erupts before Miss Doublefinger intervenes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the volatile relationships between Baroque Works agents.

reveals.information: Spiders Café is operated by Miss Doublefinger as a Baroque Works front
The café serves as a covert meeting location for officer agents

description: An oasis town in Alabasta that serves as the new base for the rebel army after they abandoned Yuba. The rebels are gathering here to prepare for their final assault on the capital Alubarna.

keyMoments.title: Rebels' New Base Revealed
keyMoments.description: Toto informs the Straw Hats that the rebel army has relocated from Yuba to Katorea and is preparing to attack Alubarna.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the rebellion is progressing faster than expected, creating urgency to stop Crocodile's plan.

reveals.information: Katorea is now the base of operations for the Arabasta rebel army
The rebels moved here after Yuba became uninhabitable

description: A luxurious casino in Rainbase operated by Crocodile. Beneath the casino lies a secret underground chamber where Crocodile conducts Baroque Works business and will reveal his identity as Mr. 0 to his officer agents.

keyMoments.title: Officer Agents Transported to Rain Dinners
keyMoments.description: The assembled Baroque Works officer agents are transported from Spiders Café to Rain Dinners for their crucial meeting with Mr. 0.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the next episode's dramatic revelation of Crocodile's identity as the leader of Baroque Works.

reveals.information: Rain Dinners will host the meeting between Mr. 0 and his officer agents
